definitions.definition: to hit something and cause a noise:
examples: Someone was thumping on the door.

definitions.definition: to hit someone with your fist (= closed hand):
examples: He thumped him in the face.

definitions.definition: If your head thumps, you can feel pain in strong beats in your head:
examples: When I woke up my mouth was dry and my head was thumping.

definitions.definition: If your heart thumps, it beats more strongly and quickly than usual, because of exercise, fear, or excitement:
examples: She stood outside his room, her heart thumping.

definitions.definition: the sound of something heavy hitting something:
examples: She fell to the floor with a thump.

definitions.definition: an act of thumping someone or something:
examples: If he does that again I'm going to give him a thump (= hit him with my closed hand).
